title: Boring Default Game Rules Configuration File
description: The config file for the "Boring Default Game Rules" mod.

$schema.title: $schema
$schema.description: The standard method of assigning a JSON schema to a JSON file. If the value is set as "GENERATE_ME", Boring Default Game Rules will regenerate the path to the schema.

default_game_rules.title: Default Game Rules
default_game_rules.description: Defines the default game rules, whose values will override the original default values. This mod provides game rule suggestions by generating a JSON schema.

blockExplosionDropDecay.title: In block interaction explosions, some blocks won't drop their loot
blockExplosionDropDecay.description: Some of the drops from blocks destroyed by explosions caused by block interactions are lost in the explosion.

commandModificationBlockLimit.title: Command modification block limit
commandModificationBlockLimit.description: Number of blocks that can be changed at once by one command, such as fill or clone.

doEntityDrops.title: Drop entity equipment
doEntityDrops.description: Controls drops from minecarts (including inventories), item frames, boats, etc.

doLimitedCrafting.title: Require recipe for crafting
doLimitedCrafting.description: If enabled, players will be able to craft only unlocked recipes.

doMobLoot.title: Drop mob loot
doMobLoot.description: Controls resource drops from mobs, including experience orbs.

doMobSpawning.title: Spawn mobs
doMobSpawning.description: Some entities might have separate rules.

doTileDrops.title: Drop blocks
doTileDrops.description: Controls resource drops from blocks, including experience orbs.

doVinesSpread.title: Vines spread
doVinesSpread.description: Controls whether or not the Vines block spreads randomly to adjacent blocks. Does not affect other types of vine blocks such as Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, etc.

enderPearlsVanishOnDeath.title: Thrown Ender Pearls vanish on death
enderPearlsVanishOnDeath.description: Whether Ender Pearls thrown by a player vanish when that player dies.

forgiveDeadPlayers.title: Forgive dead players
forgiveDeadPlayers.description: Angered neutral mobs stop being angry when the targeted player dies nearby.

globalSoundEvents.title: Global sound events
globalSoundEvents.description: When certain game events happen, like a boss spawning, the sound is heard everywhere.

lavaSourceConversion.title: Lava converts to source
lavaSourceConversion.description: When flowing lava is surrounded on two sides by lava sources it converts into a source.

maxCommandChainLength.title: Command chain size limit
maxCommandChainLength.description: Applies to command block chains and functions.

maxCommandForkCount.title: Command context limit
maxCommandForkCount.description: Maximum number of contexts that can be used by commands like 'execute as'.

mobExplosionDropDecay.title: In mob explosions, some blocks won't drop their loot
mobExplosionDropDecay.description: Some of the drops from blocks destroyed by explosions caused by mobs are lost in the explosion.

playersNetherPortalCreativeDelay.title: Player's Nether portal delay in creative mode
playersNetherPortalCreativeDelay.description: Time (in ticks) that a creative mode player needs to stand in a Nether portal before changing dimensions.

playersNetherPortalDefaultDelay.title: Player's Nether portal delay in non-creative mode
playersNetherPortalDefaultDelay.description: Time (in ticks) that a non-creative mode player needs to stand in a Nether portal before changing dimensions.

playersSleepingPercentage.title: Sleep percentage
playersSleepingPercentage.description: The percentage of players who must be sleeping to skip the night.

projectilesCanBreakBlocks.title: Projectiles can break blocks
projectilesCanBreakBlocks.description: Controls whether impact projectiles will destroy blocks that are destructible by them.

snowAccumulationHeight.title: Snow accumulation height
snowAccumulationHeight.description: When it snows, layers of snow form on the ground up to at most this number of layers.

spawnChunkRadius.title: Spawn chunk radius
spawnChunkRadius.description: Amount of chunks that stay loaded around the overworld spawn position.

spawnRadius.title: Respawn location radius
spawnRadius.description: Controls the size of the area around the spawn point that players can spawn in.

tntExplosionDropDecay.title: In TNT explosions, some blocks won't drop their loot
tntExplosionDropDecay.description: Some of the drops from blocks destroyed by explosions caused by TNT are lost in the explosion.

universalAnger.title: Universal anger
universalAnger.description: Angered neutral mobs attack any nearby player, not just the player that angered them. Works best if forgiveDeadPlayers is disabled.

waterSourceConversion.title: Water converts to source
waterSourceConversion.description: When flowing water is surrounded on two sides by water sources it converts into a source.

generate_json_schema.title: Generate JSON Schema
generate_json_schema.description: If enabled, this mod will generate a JSON schema in order to aid with configuration. You may disable this if you don't plan to change the settings and want to save space, and once disabled, you can safely remove both the schema and the "$schema" property.
